channel.title: Events on CCTMC
channel.description: Recent content in Events on CCTMC

item.title: 2019 Spring Outing
item.description:
Last Saturday, CCTMCers went outing at the Olympic Forest Park. We had a great time burning calories and taking snapshots despite the cold and mizzly weather Warm up session
Walking race session     Participants were devided into three teams: Red, Blue and Yellow. Let’s do some warming-up together! Rules of the Game     1. Both roaming and jogging are ok; each team’s result is based on the last-arriving member’s record;
